p: Natural antagonists of SARS-CoV enzymes, e.g., nsP13 helicase and 3CL protease, have been described, including myricetin ( Figure 13) (a flavonoid polyphenolic molecule with antioxidant effects detected in fruits and vegetables), scutellarein ( Figure 14) (a flavone occurring in the roots, stems, and flowers of Scutellaria lateriflora, a perennial member of the Lamiaceae, and other Scutellaria species, as well as Asplenium belangeri), and phenolic compounds from dyerâ€™s woad ( Isatis indigotica) ( Figure 15) and Japanese nutmeg-yew ( Torreya nucifera) ( Figure 16) [ 26, 51, 55].
